titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I finished the Sermon for the Durham Mayor & Corporation: wrote a Birthday letter to Marion: attended Evensong in the Cathedral: & afterwards expounded to Browne [Brown] & Laidler what was to be done above [sic] moving the standards in the Sanctuary.
